[Cross posted from my Bryght blog. Off to the Netherlands to hang with my sister and her family in Rotterdam for a bit. See you in Amsterdam starting Sunday at Drupal Conference Amsterdam 2005, Euro OSCON and then BarCamp Amsterdam]

Great news! Mediamatic, home of the famous Playing Flickr exhibit, has agreed to donate their fabulous 5th floor workshop space for BarCamp Amsterdam 2005. Thanks (and thanks to Mies, a Dutch university student for being our man on the ground and liaising with Mediamatic) ! Check out Mediamatic#039s BarCamp Amsterdamp writeup. See you in Amsterdam!
